title: DO YOU REPORT YOUR ENTIRE TEAM IF THEY SURRENDER IN RANKED?
body:
I DO...

I WOULD REPORT YOU TOO FOR SURRENDERING IN RANKED. 

IF YOU WERE ON MY TEAM YOU WOULD GET A DOUBLE REPORT OF A TRIPPLE OR QUADRA. 

I WILL QUADRA REPORT YOU IF YOU SURRENDER IN RANKED. 

HOW CAN I GET AHEAD IN RANKED IF EVERY TEAM SURRENDERS?

replies.body:
- Double/Triple/Quadra reports = 1 report

- Your reports will be considered False Reports just because you're not satisfied with the surrendering.

So it's a shouting match you want, is it? Well, game on.

AAAH! AAAH! AAAH! AAAH! I'M BEATING YOU! AAAH!

how have you not been banned yet?

Gonna report this thread too :)

IT DOESN'T MATTER UR ELO IS STILL TRASH.

HOW CAN I GET AHEAD IF THERE ARE PEOPLE LIKE YOU ON MY TEAM?????

I WOULD REPORT YOU IF YOU WERE STILL BRONZE 5.

IN FACT I WOULD REPORT EVERY SINGLE PERSON THAT IS A LOWER RANK BELOW ME

I WOULD QUADRA REPORT THEM

WHO IS WITH ME?!?!??!?!?!11111?!/1?!!!1!?!?!1!/11!?

/s

If we were obviously and undeniably about to win (i.e. at their exposed nexus with the enemy team aced), I would.

If it was just a normal surrender vote, I wouldn't.
If I got stuck on a team with you, I'd surrender just to get away.

I would report someone if they rage quit, or leave the game right after the remake time in rank, but I wouldn't report them for surrendering. Well if the other four of my teammate want to surrender I guess I will just have to accept what is happening since most of the time it is understandable so I wouldn't report them after the game.
If you surrender your keys should stick to your fingers and your laptop should start smoking.
In World War II the Russians just shot soldiers who quit.
Maybe if you quit it should just ban your account instead.
If you would like me to surrender in ranked on your team next time you play perhaps you would also like to eat a big long log out of my butt!

1.  You would of liked to see who'd of won but the enemy team surrendered.
2. You could of won the match but your team surrendered.
3. Someone likes to drag their feet and isn't even playing... gets rewarded with the ability to surrender.
